modShortDescription: Saminal is back, with his second public mod release. It's a bunch of working items for your base. Working Oven, Working Faucets, Working Lamps and Lights.
modDescription:
And Saminal is back, with his second public mod release. This time, it’s a bunch of working items for your base, based on existing vanilla items so everything is server-side only.

## Working Oven

Build yourself a working wall oven which functions the same as a campfire, with a slightly lower heatmap footprint. This is unlocked by the Master Chef perk.

## Working Faucets (or taps, if you like)

Using an existing brass or household faucet, which you can either forge, or steal from a house, you can craft a working version which will allow you to fill jars and buckets in the comfort of your own survival fortress / cosy homestead. These are unlocked by the Advanced Engineering perk.

## Working Lamps and Lights

Adds a new variant block to allow placing a number of lamps usually only available in “POI” form. These working versions require power, and they can be turned on and off like the vanilla player craftable [lights](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-lights/).

In keeping this server-side only, he has been unable to modify the models for these and as a result, the wire connection point for most of the lights is in the centre of the block, which looks a bit awful for most of them. To work around this, he has included a wireless wire relay. Any [cables](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-electricity/) to and from this relay are invisible.

The lights and wireless relay are unlocked by the Advanced Engineering perk, and also by the Basics of Electricity schematic.

## Changelog

* Added Working Gas Grill and Working Charcoal Grill
* Added 10 more lights to the Working Lamps and Lights
* Fixed wrong icon on Brass Porch Light

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jGy79HTQTjzcDJOzhH9wgmacZ0E3tgNs/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23157-sams-working-stuff/).

**Credits:** [Saminal](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/saminal/)
